articles.title: Gold prices today gain, trade above Rs 50,000 mark - Economic Times
articles.description: In the spot market, gold prices on Friday inched up by Rs 65 to Rs 49,551 per 10 grams in the national capital reflecting gains in the international rates, according to HDFC Securities. Silver prices also jumped Rs 298 to Rs 61,232 per kg.
articles.content:
